name: Content Brick/Block Kit
description:
In my first project shared with FIGMA Community, I'd like to make easy the way of creating a website structure and mapping out content. Using The Content Brick Method inspired by Octopus App (a great tool to create Sitemap), I created this file where you'll find some of most common bricks/blocks to create your own Sitemap.


As this is the V1, I really would like to know your thoughts to improve the bricks.


Recommend to use with: User Flow Kit or ProToFlow (plugin)
